mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (USER_NO, USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, EMAIL ) VALUES (SEQ_UNO.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{email} )
mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO, USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, ADDRESS, POSTCODE, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "ENROLL_DATE", STATUS, PURCHASE, GR_LEVEL FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET USER_NAME = #{userName}, USER_PWD = #{userPwd}, PHONE = #{phone}, POSTCODE = #{postcode}, ADDRESS1 = #{address1}, ADDRESS2 = #{address2}, ADDRESS = #{address} WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'
